title: Deployment docs: clean rebuild/redeploy procedure + draft deployment troubleshooting

requirements.summary: Expand deployment documentation with a clear clean rebuild + redeploy procedure and troubleshooting notes for intermittent Caffeine draft deployment failures and the known draft preview disallowed-origin console error.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md` contains a clearly labeled section for performing a clean rebuild and redeploy, with concrete steps a developer can follow.
`frontend/docs/DEPLOYMENT.md` includes a troubleshooting section that mentions intermittent platform-level draft deployment failures and recommends retrying a clean rebuild/redeploy when they occur.

The troubleshooting section mentions the known draft preview console error `draft-editor:error disallowed origin: https://just-olive-eim-draft.caffeine.xyz` as a platform preview issue, without attributing it to application code.
All new/updated documentation text is written in English.

file_operations.description: Rewrite/extend the deployment guide to (1) add a clearly labeled “Clean rebuild and redeploy” section with concrete steps to clear local build artifacts/caches (e.g., dependency install artifacts, build outputs, tool caches as applicable) and then rebuild + redeploy using the project’s existing tooling/scripts; and (2) add a “Troubleshooting” section that explicitly covers intermittent Caffeine draft deployment failures with retry guidance and explicitly documents the known draft preview console error `draft-editor:error disallowed origin: https://just-olive-eim-draft.caffeine.xyz` as a platform preview issue (not application code). Ensure all documentation text is in English and avoid introducing new tools or workflows beyond what the repo already uses.
